node_name.A: amount of exercise the person gets

Data.text_description:
The probability of amount of exercise the person gets being adequate (A=1) is 0.5176. 
The probability of dietary habits of the person being healthy (B=1) is 0.4894. 
For those with dietary habits of the person being unhealthy (B=0), the probability of overall health of the person being good (C=1) is 0.2926. 
For those with dietary habits of the person being healthy (B=1), the probability of overall health of the person being good (C=1) is 0.7918. 
For those with amount of exercise the person gets being little (A=0) and overall health of the person being poor (C=0), the probability of life expectancy of the person being long (D=1) is 0.1480. 
For those with amount of exercise the person gets being little (A=0) and overall health of the person being good (C=1), the probability of life expectancy of the person being long (D=1) is 0.3480. 
For those with amount of exercise the person gets being adequate (A=1) and overall health of the person being poor (C=0), the probability of life expectancy of the person being long (D=1) is 0.4968. 
For those with amount of exercise the person gets being adequate (A=1) and overall health of the person being good (C=1), the probability of life expectancy of the person being long (D=1) is 0.7521.

Background.data_info: 在人的饮食习惯为健康(B=1)的条件下, 人的预期寿命为短(D=0)的概率为0.4893。人的预期寿命为短(D=0)的概率为0.5503。人的饮食习惯为不健康(B=0)且人的预期寿命为短(D=0)的概率为0.3107。

Questions.Instruction: 考虑人的饮食习惯作用于人的预期寿命的充分性概率(probability of sufficiency, PS)。
Questions.Question: 给定人的饮食习惯为不健康且人的预期寿命为短, 假如人的饮食习惯为健康，此时人的预期寿命为长的概率的下界是多少？
